Title: Assault at Serenity Court
Text: I’ve received a letter about an assault incident involving Ms. Sophia Rodriguez. She’s located at Serenity Court in the Downtown district, near the Bravo Fuel Station to the North-West. While nothing was stolen, she was attacked by a thief. I need to find her then speak with her to gather more details about the incident.
CompleteText: I’ve reached Serenity Court and found Ms. Sophia Rodriguez. Now, I can talk with her and learn more about what happened.
